column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Please know that we have suffered in the past by guests who tell us their dinner companions are "just coming up the sidewalk" or "just parking the car
column2: only to create a massive-seating backlog. Also, there have been many occasions when our restaurant has gone from nearly empty to completely full in less than 15 minutes. I appreciate your taking the time to bring this to my attention, and I am also grateful to you for your kind words regarding our food.
